product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: When you're away from home on a backpacking trip and want some added comfort to your cot or sleeping bag, try the self-inflating, regular-size ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad. Top fabric is tough, lightweight ripstop fabric and the bottom is polyester taffeta. Pad will inflate and deflate quickly with the jet stream foam, and roll up compactly to fit into the stuff sack. Stuff sack, compression straps and repair kit are included with the ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad. Special buy.
short_description: When you're away from home on a backpacking trip and want some added comfort to your cot or sleeping bag, try the self-inflating, regular-size ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad.
